pkgmetadata.longdescription: Estimate accuracy measures for risk prediction markers from survival data // This package provides a function to estimate the AUC, TPR(c), FPR(c), PPV(c), and NPV(c) for for a specific timepoint and marker cutoff value c using non-parametric and semi-parametric estimators. Standard errors and confidence intervals are also computed. Either analytic or bootstrap standard errors can be computed.
